com.ex.daos

Class AdminDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ex.daos.AdminDao

  • public class AdminDao
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provide the interaction between the Object Admin and the MongoDatabase. This class implements validation, adding new admin, and finding a new admin.

      This method gets the admin's password, given the username.

      This method is in charge of updating the admin's email if the admin exists in the system

      This method is in charge of updating the admin's password if the admin exists in the system and if the old password is authenticated

      • validateAdmin

        public boolean validateAdmin(java.lang.String username,
                             java.lang.String password)
        This verifies the provided username and password do exist in the database.
        Parameters:
        username - from which the session user is attempting to login
        password - from which the session user is attempting to login
        Returns:
        true if parameters are validated by the database

      • addAdmin

        public boolean addAdmin(Admin Admin)
        This method adds a new admin into the databse
        Parameters:
        Admin - object who shall be added to the database
        Returns:
        true if the addition of the new admin is successful

      • findAdmin

        public Admin findAdmin(java.lang.String username)
        This method attempts to find an admin with the given username.
        Parameters:
        username - of an admin whose existence in the database will be verified
        Returns:
        true if the admin is found

      • updateAdminUsername

        public boolean updateAdminUsername(Admin admin,
                                   java.lang.String newUsername)
        This method will find the existing employee and shall update the username of the Employee
        Parameters:
        admin - who's username shall be updated
        newUsername - is the new username that will be assigned to the Employee
        Returns:
        true if successful

      • updateAdminEmail

        public boolean updateAdminEmail(Admin admin,
                                java.lang.String newEmail)
        This method is in charge of updating the admin's email if the admin exists in the system
        Parameters:
        admin - the email of whom to update
        newEmail - the new email to update to
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise

      • updateAdminPassword

        public boolean updateAdminPassword(Admin admin,
                                   java.lang.String oldPassword,
                                   java.lang.String newPassword1)
        This method is in charge of updating the admin's password if the admin exists in the system and if the old password is authenticated
        Parameters:
        admin - the email of whom to update
        oldPassword - the old password to authenticate with
        newPassword1 - the new password to update to
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise

      • getPassword

        public java.lang.String getPassword(java.lang.String username)
        This method gets the admin's password, given the username. This method is called sparingly to only validate if absolutely necessary to validate
        Parameters:
        username - of whom we would like to retrieve the password
        Returns:
        the password of the admin
